text: Disney Plus‘ new TV and movie release schedule for March 3 – March 9, 2025, includes Malawi Wildlife Rescue Season 2, Marvel Television’s Daredevil: Born Again, Morphle: Shorts, and Primos. On March 3, Malawi Wildlife Rescue Season 2 drops on Disney Plus. The documentary series showcases the events at Malawi’s only wildlife sanctuary. Head veterinarian Dr. Amanda Salb and her team put in all their efforts to protect and rescue the animals and help them return to the wild safely. Further, Marvel Television’s Daredevil: Born Again premieres on the streaming platform this week. The series focuses on a blind lawyer named Matt Murdock, who embarks on a journey for justice. However, his life takes an interesting turn when he meets the former gangster and now a politician, Wilson Fisk, leading to a collision of the past. Later, the animated series Morphle: Shorts will be available on Disney Plus. It focuses on Mila and her pet, who has the ability to transform her dreams into reality. Thus, the duo engages in a series of adventures, showcasing the importance of friendship. Also coming out on Disney Plus is Primos on March 5. The animated series focuses on a 10-year-old girl, Tater, who carries an “it factor” that sets her apart from others. Soon, her cousins help her discover her exceptional talent, leading to a series of hilarious and dramatic events. New Disney Plus releases for March 3 – March 9, 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Disney Plus from March 3 to March 9, 2025 March 3 Malawi Wildlife Rescue (S2, 6 episodes) March 4 Marvel Television’s Daredevil: Born Again – Two-Episode Premiere March 5 Morphle: Shorts (S1, 15 episodes) Primos (S1, 9 episodes) Win or Lose – Two New Episodes For more Disney Plus content, check out the streaming release date for Moana 2. Also, here is the trailer for Andor Season 2.
html:
Disney Plus‘ new TV and movie release schedule for March 3 – March 9, 2025, includes Malawi Wildlife Rescue Season 2, Marvel Television’s Daredevil: Born Again, Morphle: Shorts, and Primos.

On March 3, Malawi Wildlife Rescue Season 2 drops on Disney Plus. The documentary series showcases the events at Malawi’s only wildlife sanctuary. Head veterinarian Dr. Amanda Salb and her team put in all their efforts to protect and rescue the animals and help them return to the wild safely.

Further, Marvel Television’s Daredevil: Born Again premieres on the streaming platform this week. The series focuses on a blind lawyer named Matt Murdock, who embarks on a journey for justice. However, his life takes an interesting turn when he meets the former gangster and now a politician, Wilson Fisk, leading to a collision of the past.

Later, the animated series Morphle: Shorts will be available on Disney Plus. It focuses on Mila and her pet, who has the ability to transform her dreams into reality. Thus, the duo engages in a series of adventures, showcasing the importance of friendship.

Also coming out on Disney Plus is Primos on March 5. The animated series focuses on a 10-year-old girl, Tater, who carries an “it factor” that sets her apart from others. Soon, her cousins help her discover her exceptional talent, leading to a series of hilarious and dramatic events.

New Disney Plus releases for March 3 – March 9, 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Disney Plus from March 3 to March 9, 2025

March 3

  • Malawi Wildlife Rescue (S2, 6 episodes)

March 4

  • Marvel Television’s Daredevil: Born Again – Two-Episode Premiere

March 5

  • Morphle: Shorts (S1, 15 episodes)
  • Primos (S1, 9 episodes)
  • Win or Lose – Two New Episodes

For more Disney Plus content, check out the streaming release date for Moana 2. Also, here is the trailer for Andor Season 2.
